item.description:
The End of Suburbia: Oil Depletion and The Collapse of The American Dream

This film looks at the boom in suburban development after WWII and how it's sprawled to its current state. At the same time, the film addresses the problems suburbia faces in the wake of World Peak Oil in a lifestyle built on an ever-increasing supply of fossil fuels.

After the film, we'll be discussing Peak Oil and Climate Change and the position Portland may find itself in as these 2 issues start to play a bigger role in our community. Cookies and Coffee, Tea will be provided...who needs a better reason to come?!!
